about_the_game:
Restart ShuHan Dynasty Demo is the trial version of Restart ShuHan Dynasty：Origin, the game as a history of The Three Kingdoms as the background, "Liu Bei" the main perspective of the immersive interactive game, which incorporates modern anecdotes and suspense elements.

In this trial version, you will play a modern man who has passed through to the Eastern Han Dynasty of China, get a new identity - Liu Bei, in the ignorant initial exploration of the life habits of some ancient ordinary people, and in the first meeting with Guan Yu Zhang Fei re-interpretation or serious or relaxed and funny peach garden friendship, whether you can get two people's love, all in your negotiation skills. Your choices directly or indirectly affect the outcome of the game, and even when you hesitates for a few seconds to reflect on the lack of a choice, the story quietly continues to push backwards until it slides into another unknown possibility.

The intention of the scene art to create a boutique, the production team to CCTV 94 version of the classic romance of The Three Kingdoms of the costume road as a reference example, the atmosphere and strive to bring the player that a original.
detailed_description:
Restart ShuHan Dynasty Demo is the trial version of Restart ShuHan Dynasty：Origin, the game as a history of The Three Kingdoms as the background, "Liu Bei" the main perspective of the immersive interactive game, which incorporates modern anecdotes and suspense elements.

In this trial version, you will play a modern man who has passed through to the Eastern Han Dynasty of China, get a new identity - Liu Bei, in the ignorant initial exploration of the life habits of some ancient ordinary people, and in the first meeting with Guan Yu Zhang Fei re-interpretation or serious or relaxed and funny peach garden friendship, whether you can get two people's love, all in your negotiation skills. Your choices directly or indirectly affect the outcome of the game, and even when you hesitates for a few seconds to reflect on the lack of a choice, the story quietly continues to push backwards until it slides into another unknown possibility.

The intention of the scene art to create a boutique, the production team to CCTV 94 version of the classic romance of The Three Kingdoms of the costume road as a reference example, the atmosphere and strive to bring the player that a original.
developers: 浙江海蕊盈信网络科技有限公司

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Inter core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 独立显卡
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 16 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 有独立显卡最佳
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Inter core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics:
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 16 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 有独立显卡最佳
